attributes.action: request Her Most Gracious Majesty Queen Elizabeth the Second to annul the knighthood awarded to Sir Fred Goodwin in 2004 on account of his "Services to Banking".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To my certain knowledge Sir Fred's signal honour was awarded for his "Services to Banking", any services (not gazetted) such as those to charity would most likely have followed by virtue of his being Chief Executive of a major PLC and for no other reason.
One could reasonably assume that these "Services to Banking" would have carried on at least until his (natural) retirement, whereas they clearly have not.
Sir Fred can, in retrospect, be seen to have presided over a complete and utter debacle of such magnitude that to "strip" him of his title is the only way of maintaining the dignity of the Order of Chivalry he currently holds and debases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
